name: Name
successRegText: Now you can sign in! We hope our service make your business easier.
logoutSuccessText: Now you are unauthorized. You can use other account in order to work with our service
yourMachineMainText: You can watch and check status of your machines. To refresh this data just click on refresh button
chooseName: Please choose a name for this machine
addMacDescription: You can add new machine there. Mac_id and Code you can find at telemetric module, that you want to add
actionsDescry: There you can do different actions, like add new machine or bind existing, delete machine log or machine
deleteMacDescry: Warning! You can't decline this action after it starts. This action delete machine data and logs from our service
bindMacDescry: You can bind other existing machine here.
unbindMacDescry: You can unbind foreign machines there. If you want unbind your machine, use delete function instead
delMacLogsDescry: You can delete machine history (logs) there. Only owner this machine can do it.
compListDescry: You can find different companies there.
